summary: An Ordinance providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of Lots One (1) and Two (2), Block One (1) in the Seattle Tide Lands, and Lots One (1) to Eleven (11) inclusive, Block One (1), in the Ballard Tide Lands, for Garbage Crematory and Destructor purposes, and providing for the payment of just compensation to be made for the private property to be condemned, appropriated, taken or damaged for said purposes.
